description: Two adult mammoths are cautioning a younger mammoth to play but avoid tar pits. The irony lies in the mundane parental warning delivered in a prehistoric setting where tar pits represented a significant, potentially fatal, threat to such creatures. The scene presents a common parenting scenario of warning a child about danger transposed onto a context of geological death traps known for preserving ancient life.  The image specifically features mammoths, a young one being addressed by two adults, and a landscape implied to contain dangerous tar pits. The humor derives from presenting a historical extinction hazard as a simple 'stay away from' instruction.
caption: “All right. Run along and play ... and stay away from those tar pits!”
